data.title: Harvard Film Archive
data.meta_description: Although acclaimed for his powerful social dramas (The Crowd, Our Daily Bread), director King Vidor was equally adept at exploring matters of the heart with a cynical edge. Ronald Colman stars as a married London barrister who innocently begins ...
